use weather;


CREATE Table [Location] (
  Id	INT	NOT NULL	IDENTITY(1,1)	PRIMARY KEY,
  ZipCode	VARCHAR(10)	NOT NULL,
  StationId VARCHAR(10)
);

insert into [Location] values('00766', 'KMSO');
insert into [Location] values('00777', 'KMSO');
insert into [Location] values('00791', 'KMSP');


CREATE Table [WeatherData] (
  Id INT NOT NULL IDENTITY(1,1)	PRIMARY KEY,
  StationId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  ZipCode VARCHAR(10)	NOT NULL,
  RDate DATE NOT NULL,
  HighTmp SMALLINT NOT NULL,
  LowTmp SMALLINT NOT NULL,
  AvgTmp SMALLINT NOT NULL,
  DewPt SMALLINT NOT NULL
);

select distinct LEN(LZip) from Locations;
